thread.section_title: South Carolina High School Sports Headlines
thread.title: 2016 ASFC Registration Open

title: 2016 ASFC Registration Open
text:
ALL PLAYERS EXCEPT WIDE RECEIVERS (LINEMEN GET 10 YARD SPLIT) 60 YARD DASH WIDE RECE SKILLS SESSION GIVES YOU FEEDBACK TO IMPROVE ONE ON ONE COMPETITION "We bring the kids together to showcase their skills against each other," said Baxter. "The quarterbacks will throw to receivers who will be covered by the defensive backs; the running backs and linebackers go up against each other and it enables us to evaluate them in their reads and reaction; the offensive linemen and defensive linemen go head to head, showcasing their blocking skills and rush techniques respectively. The thing I like best about the one-on-ones is we can 
EXPOSURE 
so invite all Shrine Bowl and North-South Coaches to our event, with a pre-printed roster of players and their performance numbes so that they may be evaluated in our testing and showcase portion of the event. Site: BROOKLAND-CAYCE HIGH SCHOOL
